column4: :-( -- my folks are 50 miles away - but there are sometimes when you actually need to be physically present - trying to talk my 85 yo dad through booting up off a livecd and running e2fsck to fix a problem - it was easier for me to drive down there, spend 10 minutes fixing and return.
yaeah, looks like I will have to make the trip
good luck - but if I got my folks off of windows, it was worth it to me.  I actually spend far less time doing system admin tasks with linux, then with win xp.
